entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued February 07 at 11:35PM EST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Icy Spots Possible... Temperatures below freezing may cause wet surfaces to freeze, causing the possibility of icy spots through early morning. Anyone travelling should allow extra time to get to their destinations.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued February 07 at 9:02PM EST by NWS
entry.summary: ...ICY SPOTS POSSIBLE INTO TUESDAY MORNING... With some freezing drizzle possible late this evening and into the early morning hours along with the freezing of standing water on area roads, some icy spots will be possible through the overnight. This will be especially true for secondary and untreated roads. Exercise caution when traveling tonight into Tuesday morning.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued February 07 at 11:35PM EST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Patchy Freezing Drizzle and Light Snow Possible... Patchy freezing drizzle along with light snow is possible along and west of the Allegheny Front in Garrett and western Grant Counties through early morning. Any accumulation will be light, but roads may become slippery as a result. Anyone travelling should allow extra time to get to their destinations.

Occasional gusts between 60 mph and 70 mph are possible west of Clark and near Chief Joseph.

entry.summary: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 MPH with gusts up to 70 MPH possible. * WHERE...North Snowy Range Foothills including Arlington and Elk Mountain along Interstate 80 between Laramie and Rawlins. Central Laramie Range including Bordeaux along Interstate 25 between Chugwater and Wheatland.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; North Snowy Range Foothills

entry.title: High Wind Warning issued February 07 at 7:42PM MST until February 08 at 8:00AM MST by NWS
entry.summary: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 MPH with gusts up to 70 MPH possible. * WHERE...South Laramie Range and Adjacent Foothills including Interstate 80 between Laramie and Cheyenne. Interstate 25 corridor in central Laramie and eastern Platte Counties including the cities of Cheyenne and Wheatland.
